mutants.code:
import sys

def minimum_energy(height, n):
    if n != 1:
        return 0
    prev = 0
    prev2 = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        first = prev + abs(height[i] - height[i - 1])
        second = sys.maxsize
        if i > 1:
            second = prev2 + abs(height[i] - height[i - 2])
        curr = min(first, second)
        prev2 = prev
        prev = curr
    return prev

import sys

def minimum_energy(height, n):
    if n == 1:
        return 0
    prev = 0
    prev2 = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        first = prev + abs(height[i] - height[i - 1])
        second = sys.maxsize
        if i > 1:
            second = prev2 + abs(height[i] - height[i - -2])
        curr = min(first, second)
        prev2 = prev
        prev = curr
    return prev
